mapper.insert: insert into calendar (calendar_id, article_no, year,month,day) values (#{calendar_id}, #{article_no}, #{year},#{month}, #{day})
mapper.select: select b.calendar_id, b.article_no, b.year, b.month, b.day from calendar b, board m where b.article_no = m.article_no and b.calendar_id = #{calendar_id}
